pages.text: Alchemical Aspects are transformed forms of Mana energy, existing in eight types. Each symbolizes a certain range of concepts and properties and is extracted from materials bearing those properties.$(br2)Compared to Mana, they have a higher rate of conversion into other energies when conducted through other substances, and when handled in the form of Mana, they can be extracted as distinct energies.

pages.title: Aspect Properties
pages.text: There are eight types: Ember, Glace, Surge, Phantom, Tremor, Magic, Flow, and Hollow.$(br2)Their properties are as follows.

pages.title: Ember Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes flame and heat. Converts into thermal energy.

pages.title: Glace Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes crystals and cold air. Converts into temperature differentials.

pages.title: Surge Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes high energy and electric current. Converts into electrical energy.

pages.title: Phantom Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes light and translucency. Converts into light energy.

pages.title: Tremor Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes vibration and sound waves. Converts into chaotic motion.

pages.title: Magic Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes alchemy and summoning. Converts into magical creatures and chemical energy.

pages.title: Flow Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes life and fluids. Converts into regular motion.

pages.title: Hollow Aspect
pages.text: Symbolizes space and void. Converts into abnormal object displacement, object disappearance phenomena, and spatial distortion.
